name: PAC-MAN VS. ( Up to 4 players )
description:
A FAN MADE MULTIPLAYER PAC-MAN VS. 

Game I made from a (2)Months MULTIPLAYER PACMAN GAME DEVELOPMENT CHALLENGE from Gamedev . Net 

PAC-MAN is a registered trademark and brand of BANDAI NAMCO Entertainment Inc,  this game is not related to the owner Namco Inc. but a fan made games from the challenge entry and released for free.

Report Bugs if any ^_^y but most likely it has,  since I only spend (2)hours every night for the (2)Months challenge deadline. I created this from scratch using MonoGame, ZGDK-MG and  ZNET.

HAPPY CHOMP CHOMP CHOMP ^ _^ y
